snippet: Gov. Pete Wilson temporarily suspended the state's endangered species law in disaster areas today, saying it would help in the cleanup of storm and flood damage.   "As Californians start their rebuilding efforts, it is important that state rules a...
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pete Wilson temporarily suspended the state's endangered species law in disaster areas today, saying it would help in the cleanup of storm and flood damage. "As Californians start their rebuilding efforts, it is important that state rules and regulations not stand in their way," Mr. Wilson said.

headline.main: California Suspends Statute Protecting Endangered Species
